metadata.title: Adapt ad insertion to Low-Latency HLS

abstract.text: Find out how to integrate advertising into your Low-Latency HLS streams through server-side ad insertion. We‚Äôll show you how to segment your ad content, and examine how ad insertion works with LL-HLS features such as Blocking Playlist Reload and Blocking Preload Hints.

abstract.text: Xcode 12, Swift 5.3, iOS 14, macOS 11 (Big Sur), tvOS 14, watchOS 7.

Blocking Playlist Reload is a required component of Low-Latency HLS that improves segment discovery time in live streams and addresses the common problem of stale playlists when delivering through an HTTP cache. Learn how to use Blocking Playlist Reload to reduce streaming latency and improve CDN performance for both low-latency and regular live HLS streams.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Reduce latency with HLS Blocking Playlist Reload

abstract.text: Session notes shared by the community for the community.

Discover Playlist Delta Updates, an HLS feature that optimizes the delivery of live streams with large playback windows and lots of metadata. We‚Äôll show you how Playlist Delta Updates can reduce overheard when producing live streams, provide higher-quality variants for people with slower connections, and integrate advertising.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Optimize live streams with HLS Playlist Delta Updates

abstract.text: Learn how to implement Blocking Preload Hints for Low-Latency HLS to reduce delivery latency and improve the reliability of your video and audio streams. Discover how to integrate LL-HLS with CMAF Chunk delivery and unify your delivery across streaming formats.
